ygData.subject: Re: How to know if Anthem is really working
ygData.msgSnippet: What a coincidence, that was what I dual wielded at 17 too, but better bring jaxons jag o vigor out of the closet, because they are both big stamina hogs, and
ygData.messageBody:
What a coincidence, that was what I dual wielded at 17
too, but better bring jaxons jag o' vigor out of the
closet, because they are both big stamina hogs, and
you'll find yours dropping quickly. At 21 I still use
a PGT and the Dragoon dirk, that way my peircing stays
up, and my stamina drain is about half of what it
would be with a tentacle whip. Plus the dragoon dirk
has a better damage/delay ratio than the whip. Of
course, I've only use weapons half the time and
instead opt for discord, dissonance, and binding
weaves, and will probably only take them out to
practice once i get the rooting as well
